welcome.title: Welcome to Lite Bite Cafeteria System! 🎉
welcome.description: Your all-in-one app for managing school meals, payments, and wallet management. Let's take a guided tour through each feature!

wallet.description:
This is your financial command center! Here you can:

• View your current balance
• See recent transactions
• Access payment gateways
• Manage your account
wallet.balanceDescription:
This card shows your current wallet balance. You can:

• Add money using the "Recharge" button
• Request refunds if needed
• See your total available funds
wallet.rechargeDescription:
Click this button to add money to your wallet:

• Paymob card payments
• Mobile wallet payments
• Secure authentication
• Instant balance updates
wallet.transactionsDescription:
Keep track of all your financial activities:

• See when money was added
• Track spending on meals
• View refund requests
• Monitor payment confirmations

payment.title: Payment & Wallet Management 💳
payment.description:
Secure payment processing with Paymob:

• Credit/Debit Card payments
• Mobile wallet payments (Vodafone Cash, Orange Money)
• Safe and encrypted transactions
• Instant balance updates

cardPayment.title: Card Payments with Paymob 💳
cardPayment.description:
Learn how to pay securely with your credit/debit card:

• Select "Card Payment" from payment options
• Enter your card details securely
• Complete billing information
• Confirm payment and receive instant confirmation

walletPayment.title: Mobile Wallet Payments 📱
walletPayment.description:
Pay using Vodafone Cash, Orange Money, and other wallets:

• Choose "Mobile Wallet" payment method
• Select your preferred wallet provider
• Enter wallet phone number
• Complete payment through wallet app

recharge.amountDescription:
Enter how much money to add to your wallet:

• Enter any amount (minimum 10 EGP)
• Amount will be validated with receipt
• Secure payment processing
recharge.methodDescription:
Choose your preferred payment method:

• Paymob Card Payment
• Mobile Wallet Payment
• Safe and encrypted transactions
recharge.billingDescription:
Enter your billing details:

• Complete billing information
• Required for payment processing
• Secure data transmission
• Instant processing
recharge.payDescription:
Ready to add money to your wallet:

• Secure 3DS authentication
• Instant balance update
• Transaction confirmation

planner.description:
Welcome to your meal planning center! Here you can:

• Browse weekly meal schedules
• Pre-order meals for your family
• View meal details and pricing
• Manage meal selections
planner.familySelectorDescription:
Select which family member you're ordering for:

• Different meal preferences
• Separate order tracking
• Individual meal management
• Family meal coordination
planner.filtersDescription:
Use these controls to organize your meal planning:

• Week Selection - Choose different time periods
• Meal Type Filters - Browse specific categories
• Custom Date Ranges - Plan for specific dates
• Family Member Selection - Order for different family members
planner.mealGridDescription:
Explore the available meals for each day:

• Different meal categories
• Pricing information
• Meal details
• Pre-order options
planner.orderButtonDescription:
Access the complete menu:

• Download PDF menu
• See all available options
• Plan your family's meals
• Review meal selections

orders.description:
Track all your meal and add-on orders:

• View order history
• Check order status
• Filter by family member
• Monitor deliveries
orders.filterDescription:
Organize your orders by family member:

• View all orders together
• Filter by specific family member
• Track individual orders
• Manage multiple accounts

profile.description:
Manage your personal information and preferences:

• Update contact details
• Change passwords
• Manage family members
• Set account preferences
profile.familyManagementDescription:
Add and manage your family members:

• Add new family members
• Set individual preferences
• Manage account settings
• Track orders per member
profile.editDescription:
Update your personal details:

• Change your name
• Update phone number
• Modify account settings
• Save preferences
profile.settingsDescription:
Customize your app experience:

• Update personal information
• Change security settings
• Manage notifications
• View activity history

contact.description:
Need assistance? The Contact Us page is here to help:

• Send us messages and questions
• Get support for any issues
• Report problems or suggestions
• Quick response within 48 hours
contact.formDescription:
Fill out this form to get in touch:

• Provide your contact information
• Describe your question or issue
• Submit and get a quick response
• Track your support requests

completion.title: Tutorial Complete! 🎓
completion.description:
Excellent! You now know how to use Cafeteria Smart System:

• Navigate between features
• Manage your wallet and recharge
• Use Paymob payment methods (Card & Mobile Wallet)
• Plan and order meals
• Track orders and manage profile
• Get help and support

Start exploring and enjoy the convenience!

faq.card_payment_question: How do I pay with my credit/debit card?
faq.card_payment_answer: Select 'Card Payment' from payment options, enter your card details securely, complete billing information, and confirm payment.
faq.wallet_payment_question: How do I pay with mobile wallet?
faq.wallet_payment_answer: Choose 'Mobile Wallet' payment method, select your preferred wallet provider (Vodafone Cash, Orange Money, etc.), enter wallet phone number, and complete payment through wallet app.
faq.billing_question: Why do I need to provide billing information?
faq.billing_answer: Billing information is required by Paymob for payment processing and compliance with financial regulations. Your data is securely transmitted and protected.
faq.security_answer: Yes, all payments are processed securely through Paymob's encrypted infrastructure. We never store your card details or sensitive payment information.
